blocks.block_description:
4.1. You have the right to know what information we are collecting on you, and to amend it if it is inaccurate.
4.2. If you feel for some reason we have information we should not be keeping, or it is out of date or otherwise wrong, please let us know and we will take appropriate action. Most of the information we hold is not based          on your individual consent but is based on our needing  the information to run our business and provide our products and services.
4.3. If you want to know what information we have about you (if any) email us at the email address set out above and give us your name, email address(es) and we will happily do a search and let you know what information we hold on you and how we are using it/have used it.
4.4. You have a “right to be forgotten”, but that does have some legal limits to it.  If you want us to remove information about you, let us know.
4.5. You can, at any time, object to the processing                 of your Personal Data on grounds relating to your particular situation. You have the right to object your Personal Data being processed for direct marketing purposes.

display_articles_4_block.article_preview_description: Автор: Глеб Буряк — доцент украинско-американского университета «Конкордия»

Corridor Audio — это мечта, которая сбылась. Это платформа для экспериментов, главной целью которой является выпуск качественного украинского контента. Сегодня Corridor Audio создает симбиоз музыки и абстрактного искусства,  настраивая слушателя и зрителя на одну частоту. Основные критерии — художественная форма и рефлексия.
